channel.title: Comments on: Love And Rockets, Lift (Red Ant)

item.title: By: RETRO: Love and Rockets "Mirror People" video, Drawer B
item.dc:creator: RETRO: Love and Rockets "Mirror People" video, Drawer B
item.description: [...] only further alienated long-time fans. The band never quite regained its footing, despite some respectable efforts. This video is for the band’s finest single from its finest record, Earth, Sun, Moon, [...]
